title: Week 1 reactions with Maurice Jones-Drew
itunes:title: Week 1 reactions with Maurice Jones-Drew
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by our old pal Maurice Jones-Drew to recap the Week 1 NFL action! The duo starts off with their reaction to Antonio Brown being released by the Raiders and signing shortly after with the Patriots (2:23). Next, Shek and MJD debated what is more important - the players on the team or the coaching (9:55)? Maurice also gives us a Jaguars update after Nick Foles broke his clavicle (34:26). Shek and Eddie Spaghetti round out the show with the Bon & Viv Food Block segment (43:55).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
